transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Good morning sir, Lakshman baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se, Lakshman baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan, Lakshman ji tumhara phone nahi lagta.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Phone kiya tha maine laga nahi aapko phone?
Executive: Nahi sir mai laga phone kar raha tha na aapko.
Customer: Abhi abhi kiya tha kya sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi nahi kiya tha bilkul.
Executive: Nahi wo busy hoga dusre number pe aisa hota hai.
Customer: Nahi ye to number ye bata raha tha ki ye number galat hai.
Executive: 7055 ye number wo hai na ye number wo hai na jo aapke usme de rakha hai.
Executive: Haan sir ye aapko kaun sa number show hota hai batayenge?
Customer: Ek minute dikha raha hu mai. Ye ek minute hold karna Lakshman ek minute hold karna.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hold pe hi hai sir.
(silence)
Executive: Bataye.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir bataye.
Customer: Hello. Bataye. Lakshman ji mai ye dekh raha tha yaar mai maine ye observe kiya na ki inke jaise hum ab ab jaise pehle to hamare isme kuch iske kya kehte hai power loader ke aa rahe the. Ab usme bearing bearing puller ke aate hai aisa kyu hota hai?
Executive: Kaise sir dobara bataye?
Customer: Jaise is starting me dekh raha tha mai uske power loader ke aa rahe the. Thik hai? Achcha. Aur jo leads jo aati hai thik hai aap ab bearing puller ki leads aa rahi hai bas chhoti chhoti. Jaise hamare roller nahi aa rahe hai kami aa rahi vibrator nahi aa raha hai separator nahi aa raha hai ye kuch ye kyu nahi aa rahe separator is kami aa rahi hai koi nahi aa rahi aisa kyu hota hai?
Executive: Sir sir sir aisa nahi hai aapne filter laga ke leads ko dekha?
Customer: Haan haan sab filter laga ke dekh liya sab kuch dekh liya sir maine.
Executive: Achcha filter laga ke aapne leads wagera.
Customer: Maine puri detail check kar liya to. Ek minute mai dekh leta hu. Laptop pe bhi check kar liya maine isko. Nahi bearing bearing puller ki abhi abhi leads dikha raha hai. Aur hello. Pata hai kya chhoti chhoti dikhata hai ye hum banate nahi hai ye kaise aa rahe hai bhai ye kehna chah raha hu hum banate nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha ye bearing puller sir sir mujhe ek baat batao bearing bearing puller aap banate nahi hai?
Customer: Chhota nahi banate hum bada banate hai. Ye bade hote hai na agar hum jo dal rahe hai wo wo aani chahiye lead me jaise hum banate nahi hai uske leads aa rahi hai. Hmm aap matlab isme category hoti hai. Badi aur chhoti. Haan. Mai sahi keh raha hu kya sir? Haan haan. Sir mai puch raha isme category category hoti hai bearing puller chhota bhi hota hoga bada bhi bada bhi hota hoga.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan haan. Hai na? Aur jo aur jo ek lead dikha raha hai inner pack LGM 203 and mechanical lock grid puller. Isme isme aap deal karte ho?
Customer: Yaar mere isme dikha nahi raha hai.
Executive: Mere me sir relevant me aap jaiye relevant me dikha raha hai.
Customer: Relevant me khol rakha hai yaar maine. Chalo fresh mara maine refresh mara.
Executive: Haan kariye relevant me dikha raha hoga.
Executive: Sir aapne customer care pe kiya tha kya uske baad?
Customer: Are yaar maine nahi laga maine pehle aapka number dial kiya. Thik hai? To wo galat bata raha hai ki number galat hai. Thik hai? Uske baad maine number 969696 number hai na usme kiya. Aapko achcha aapko pata hoga kai bari bol deta hai ki jis waise number sahi hota hai aapke dwara dial kiya gaya number. Mai wahi keh raha yaar ye number dala hua hai isme kaise galat ho sakta hai ye sir.
Executive: Nahi ye lekin wo ye maine number save kiya tha na wo phone maine change kar diya isliye se wo number aapka hat gaya wo. Waise mai number change kar lunga aapka ab. Haan kar lena sir. Jab bhi jab bhi aap usme call karte ho na to to ticket open ho jati hai. Aur aur bataye sir matlab abhi abhi abhi abhi jo recent me leads dikha raha hai ye hello. Hello. Sir haan sir.
Executive: Jo abhi recent me lead dikha raha hai wo hai mild steel 6 inch crank bearing puller isme aap deal karte hai?
Customer: Crank haan crank bearing puller badi badi crank hai na usme wahi hai wahi hai.
Executive: Achcha. Le lekin isme na wo kam hai matlab kya bolte hai ki order quantity sahi keh raha hu na?
Customer: Do haan quantity thodi badi hai nahi chhote wale me wo nahi karte sir hum. Badi honi chahiye bahut bade. To to sir order quantity kya rehti hai aapki batayenge lagbhag?
Customer: Order quantity pata karni padegi minimum kitni rehti hai.
Executive: Matlab order quantity aapko matlab kitne price se leke kitne prices tak ka order aap karte ho?
Customer: Mai aapko confirm karke bataunga ek baar. Achcha aisa hai na sir isme na ek hello. Sir Lakshman ji aapko thodi der me call karta hu Lakshman. Nahi sir mai mujhe na actually na ye ticket close karna hota hai mujhe aapse na permission leni hoti ki mai ye ticket close kar sakta hu na jo raise ho gaya hai. Achcha. Haan jab bhi aap customer care pe call karte ho na to aap ek matlab concern raise ho jata hai ki aisa to sir mai aapke sath discuss karunga matlab jaise ki jo protocol hai na uske hisab se. Haan to nahi ek kam kijiye abhi to maine aapko kuch puchne ke liye yahi puchne ki call ki thi maine ki hamare me ye kyu aa rahe hai. Nahi uske liye na mai aapko na video meet pe ek bar connect karunga to aap ho jana please. Uske liye uske liye aapko mere ko 3 baje ke baad call karni padegi kyuki mai bahar busy rehta hu na 3 baje ke baad. Koi dikkat nahi koi dikkat nahi lekin sir mai aapse na kuch cheeze discuss karunga jaise ki aapko aapko 30 days me kitni calls and inquiries aayi hai batayenge? 30 days me bahut kam aayi hai mushkil se aayi hongi 10 ya 15. Achcha 10 15 aayi hai unse kuch baat matlab hui fir aapki? Hui kuch aage badhe nahi baat wo matlab wahi. Achcha. Aise aise sir abhi tak. Achcha. Aise aap kitne clients bana paye hai jinse matlab aapki matlab matlab aap koi permanent clients bana paye hai abhi? Nahi nahi bilkul bhi nahi. Wahi to issue chal raha hai mujhe samajh nahi pa raha hu. Achcha. To sir aap ye na jaise ki aap jis products me product line me deal karte ho usme na isme isme sir competition hai aur sir isme na aapne kuch product hai wo out of stock bhi kar rakhe hai 7 HP petrol power tiller aap isme deal nahi karte ho? Phone jama ho raha hai ji. Yaar ye pata karna padega mujhe pura pata karna padega mujhe pura. Sir is mai na aapko ek cheez bataunga aap na video meet pe connect hona padega aapke aap mai mai samajh gaya problem kahan pe aa rahi hai. Sir ek kam karte hai aap aaj time banao aaj 3:30 bajega 3:30 baje me call karna mai video meet me aapka aaunga. Thik hai mai na aapko link mai aapko na link share kar deta hu aur aap na aur aur abhi ke liye sir mai ticket close kar deta hu aapko thik hai? Haan haan kar do kar do koi dikkat nahi. Thik hai sham ko sham ko sham ko. Thik hai sir. Okay. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Phone not connecting to the executive.

- Receiving irrelevant leads (bearing puller).

- Inquiries and client conversion are very low.



Resolution:

- Executive explained category variations in products.

- Executive offered a video meet to discuss issues.

- Agreed to discuss the protocol and concerns.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect on video meet at 3:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product category, video meet
